post.text: Join me LIVE in Geneva, OH!

comment.author: Erica
comment.text: Look how well he has done despite all the negative media, fighting dems and rinos. Still standing. We will win this by pure numbers November 8th. Get out and vote.

replies.author: Brent
replies.text: Everyone please remember your assigned voting days! Republicans: November 8th Democrats: November 9th

replies.author: Zachary
replies.text: please remember your assigned voting days! Republicans: November 8th Democrats: November 9th

replies.author: John
replies.text: Absolutely, let it be said let it be done !
